nodes.text: Bofa II was a planet that housed an Imperial Cargo Transfer Area during the Galactic Civil War and was the distribution site of Imperial surveillance droids. The BFF-1 bulk freighter Libom was captured there.

Bofa II first appeared in the video game Star Wars: X-Wing Tour of Duty: B-Wing. The Official Strategy Guide for the game later spelled the planet's name with a "t" and The Essential Atlas and The Essential Atlas Online Companion both originally contained a system named "Bota." An update of the Online Companion later changed the system's name to "Bofa."
